flavor_text: Puck: "This is sacred dialogue between a spirit and his contractor. You're always going on about rules, so you know you can't interfere."

name: Rem in a Hakama
expansion: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- The Frozen Bond
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Yes, Sister.
